author: reiher
msg: refactored buildRelease.xml so the release name/release jar name can be set in one place (except for javadoc)

author: jeremias
msg: Fixed the source for a division by zero when the content of an fo:leader with leader-pattern="use-content" collapses to zero width during layout.

author: hibou
msg: - marker added on the container if there is any issue with its
configuration. This maker is just an overlay on the container
- marker added on the ivy xml files when there is a issue with a
configuration issue, or a resolve problem. This maker also add
an entry in the prolem view, and the error marker is propagated
among the parent containers (project, working set)

author: ddas
msg: Merge from trunk onto 0.18 branch. Fixes HADOOP-3947.

author: slaws
msg: TUSCANY-2389 allow null elements in object array to pass
